channel.title: CVE Feed for ForgeRock -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ForgeRock -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0511|2023-02-28T20:56:22.469Z -- forgerock -- access%20management%20java%20policy%20agent
item.description: Relative Path Traversal vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management Java Policy Agent allows Authentication Bypass. This issue affects Access Management Java Policy Agent: all versions up to 5.10.1

item.title: CVE-2023-0582|2024-03-27T17:09:43.769Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management allows Authorization Bypass.
This issue affects access management: before 7.3.0, before 7.2.1, before 7.1.4, through 7.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-0339|2023-02-28T20:57:00.941Z -- forgerock -- access%20management%20web%20policy%20agent
item.description: Relative Path Traversal vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management Web Policy Agent allows Authentication Bypass. This issue affects Access Management Web Policy Agent: all versions up to 5.10.1
